ComicInfo.Title: Target Zero
ComicInfo.Series: DC Horror Presents: Sgt. Rock vs. the Army of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary:
STAND AT ATTENTION, CADET!
Easy Company's blasted their way through the undead all across Berlin—but don't get cocky now, soldier, because your platoon's just come face-to-face with something far more horrifying than zombies: Sgt. Rock has fallen in battle. Could it be that Easy Company will be sending their fearless leader home in a flag-draped coffin?
Check out this fear-soaked finale to find out!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 15:12:11. [CVDB973947]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brad Anderson, Elizabeth Torque, Francesco Francavilla, Gary Frank
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Ben Meares, Katie Kubert, Marie Javins
ComicInfo.Characters: Adolf Hitler, Bulldozer, Jackie Johnson, Little Sure Shot, Long Round, Sgt. Rock, Short Round
